item.title: [40k] Arco-Flagellant
item.description:
Creature — Human

Squad {2} (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2} any number of times. When this creature enters the battlefield, create that many tokens that are copies of it.)

Arco-Flagellant can't block.

Endurant — Pay {3} life: Arco-Flagellant gains indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [40k] The Flesh Is Weak
item.description:
Enchantment

When The Flesh Is Weak enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them are artifacts in addition to their other types.

Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1.

item.title: [40k] Company Commander
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Command Section — When Company Commander enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have.

Bring it Down! — Whenever Company Commander attack, creatures you control gain deathtouch until end of turn.

item.title: [40k] Collective Effort
item.description:
Sorcery

Escalate—Tap an untapped creature you control. (Pay this cost for each mode chosen beyond the first.)

Choose one or more —

• Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

• Destroy target enchantment.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature target player controls.
